name: Gunstructor
description:
Gunstructor let's you build your own gun, create both the weapon itself and it's projectiles to make it the best killing machine. Then proceed to use it to kill as many enemies as you can!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Weapon Design Guide:

You need 2 components to create a working Weapon.
1: A Loader
2: Either a Propulsion System on your Projectile, or an Accelerator.

The Loader will load your Projectile into the gun. The more you have, the faster the Weapon will fire.

The Accelerator increases the power of your Weapon, you'd want many for a sniper rifle or cannon like Weapon.

The Projectile will survive longer with more parts.

(This was the gun design tutorial that was in game previously. But i have temporarily moved it here)

Any feedback is appreciated
